scripts.start-sandbox: docker run --rm --name mavryk-sandbox -e flextesa_node_cors_origin='*' -e block_time=1 --detach -p 8732:20000 tqtezos/flextesa:20211206 hangzbox start && bash ./sandbox-init.sh
scripts.start-sandbox-m1: docker run --rm --platform=linux/arm64/v8 --name mavryk-sandbox -e block_time=3 --detach -p 8732:20000 oxheadalpha/flextesa:latest hangzbox start && bash ./sandbox-init.sh
scripts.pre-compile-all: rm -rf ./contracts/compiled && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -p contracts/main -o contracts/compiled
scripts.pre-compile-all-m1: rm -rf ./contracts/compiled && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -p contracts/main -o contracts/compiled -m true
scripts.compile: yarn pre-compile-all && rm -rf ./build && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build && yarn compile-lambdas && yarn compile-pack-parameters
scripts.compile-m1: yarn pre-compile-all-m1 && rm -rf ./build && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -o build -m true && yarn compile-lambdas && yarn compile-pack-parameters
scripts.qps-migrate: yarn compile && ts-node scripts/cli.ts migrate -n development
scripts.test-full: yarn compile && yarn migrate && ts-mocha --paths test/*.spec.ts --bail --timeout 500000
scripts.test-full-m1: yarn compile-m1 && yarn migrate && ts-mocha --paths test/*.spec.ts --bail --timeout 500000
